snippet.title: Oo-Topos walkthrough (Apple II - Polarware)
snippet.description:
Oo-Topos (http://www.mobygames.com/game/apple2/oo-topos) was a graphics adventure game published by Polarware in 1986 for the Apple ][. While his spaceship to Earth, the player crash landed on a planet called Oo-Topos and was captured by aliens. The player needs to gather the parts removed from his spaceship and escape the hostile planet.

Hope you enjoy the walkthrough!

The long play is done by Smartadventurer, a program that I wrote to automate the playing for vintage Apple ][ games. You can follow the project here: https://vinniethelung.wordpress.com/tag/smartadventurer/

Credits:
Cover art - www.mobygames.com
Walkthrough - apple1.chez.com (Loquechemise)
